channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dodgers vs. Blue Jays World Series Game 6: Starters, Lineups, How to Watch
item.description: The starting pitchers and starting lineups for Game 6 of the World Series between the Toronto Blue Jays and the Los Angeles Dodgers.

item.description: We're tracking the latest on what's happening around the NFL heading into Week 9 of the 2025 season.

item.title: Dolphins Part Ways With GM Chris Grier; HC Mike McDaniel Reportedly Safe
item.description: Miami has parted ways with general manager Chris Grier after dropping to 2-7, but head coach Mike McDaniel is staying put.

item.title: College Football Week 10 Picks, Preview: What to Expect in PSU-OSU, More
item.description: How can Penn State keep it close against Ohio State? Will Texas keep its CFP hopes alive against Vanderbilt? Joel Klatt previews Week 10.

item.title: NBA refs to start wearing headsets during games
item.description: NBA referees will begin using headsets during regular-season games for the first time beginning Saturday.
